library("gamlss2")

## Chapter 1: Why GAMLSS

```{r}
## Load the Munich rent data.
data("rent", package = "gamlss")

## Estimate models.
r1 <- gamlss2(R ~ Fl + A + H + loc, family = NO, data = rent, trace = FALSE)
l1 <- lm(R ~ Fl + A + H + loc,data=rent)
coef(r1, model = "mu")
coef(l1)
```
